com.austinv11.collectiveframework.minecraft.utils

Class NBTHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.austinv11.collectiveframework.minecraft.utils.NBTHelper

  • public class NBTHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a class to ease the use of NBTTags with ItemStacks. All methods will initialize an NBT Tag if none exists on the passed ItemStack

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NBTHelper()
